<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1746</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Seharane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Seharane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Seharane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Seharane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Seharane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Seharane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Seharane</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">an article about the Seharane- a Kurdish Jewish festival, lasting a few days at the close of Pesach, that traditionally marked the end of winter and the coming of spring.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">seharan,kurds,festival</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ein Artikel über das Seharane- ein kurdisches 
jüdisches Festival, einige Tage am Abschluß von Pesach dauernd, der 
traditionsgemäß das Ende des Winters und das Kommen des Frühlinges 
kennzeichnete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">un article concernant le Seharane- un festival 
juif Kurde, durant quelques jours à l'issue de Pesach, qui a 
traditionnellement marqué la fin de l'hiver et venir du ressort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">um artigo sobre o Seharane- um festival jewish 
kurdish, durando alguns dias no fim de Pesach, que marcou tradicional 
o fim do inverno e a vinda da mola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">un articolo sul Seharane- un festival 
curdo ebreo, durevole alcuni giorni alla fine di Pesach, che ha 
contrassegnato tradizionalmente la conclusione dell'inverno e venire 
della molla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ένα άρθρο για το Seharane - ένα κουρδικό εβραϊκό 
φεστιβάλ, που διαρκεί μερικές ημέρες στον περίβολο Pesach, ο 
οποίος χαρακτήρισε παραδοσιακά το τέλος του χειμώνα και τον 
ερχομό της άνοιξης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">un artículo acerca del Seharane- un festival 
judío kurdo, durando algunos días en el cierre de Pesach, que marcó
tradicionalmente finales del invierno y venir del resorte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">seharan, Kurden, Festival</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">seharan, Kurdes, festival</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">seharan, kurds, festival</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">seharan, kurds, festival</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">seharan, Κούρδοι, φεστιβάλ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">seharan, kurds, festival</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
